notes: regular -are verb; -ciare spelling without double i; uses auxiliary avere

example_sentence_italian: Tu annunciavi le regole ogni giorno.
example_sentence_english: You were announcing the rules every day.

translation_english: he was announcing/she was announcing/you (formal) were announcing
he has announced/she has announced/you (formal) have announced
notes: used with auxiliary avere; also used as formal 'Lei'
also used as formal 'Lei'; literary or historical past
example_sentence_italian: Nel 2001 il sindaco annunciò la riforma.
example_sentence_english: In 2001 the mayor announced the reform.
